title: The iust Italian Lately presented in the priuate house at Blacke Friers, by his Maiesties Seruants.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne, in Paules Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
